sharpness.description: The image has good sharpness with most details clearly visible.

brightness.description: The image is either slightly too dark or too bright.

contrast.description: The image has poor contrast appearing flat or washed out.

noise.description: The image has high noise levels that significantly degrade quality.

color_balance.description: The image has good color balance with minor color casts.

saturation.description: The image has good color saturation with appealing colors.

resolution.description: The image is low resolution (800x600) with limited detail or smooth content.

overall.summary: This image has significant quality issues that should be addressed.
